languages.text: "Бог-Император, да услышь мольбы своей дщери, да направь руку мою, дабы более не оскверняла сия ересь землю, по которой ступают слуги твои!"

traits.locale_text: "Бог-Император, да услышь мольбы своей дщери, да направь руку мою, дабы более не оскверняла сия ересь землю, по которой ступают слуги твои!"

languages.text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"
languages.original_text: "Бог-Император, да услышь мольбы своей дщери, да направь руку мою, дабы более не оскверняла сия ересь землю, по которой ступают слуги твои!"

traits.locale_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"
"God-Emperor, hear your daughter's plea! May you guide my hand so this heresy no longer defiles the ground that your servants tread on!"
"God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"
"God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"
"God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

languages.text: 「神帝陛下、娘の願いを聞き届けたまえ！ この異端がこれ以上あなたの従僕たちの踏む地を汚さないよう、私の手をお導きください！」
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下、娘の願いを聞き届けたまえ！ この異端がこれ以上あなたの従僕たちの踏む地を汚さないよう、私の手をお導きください！」

languages.text: «¡Dios Emperador, escucha la súplica de tu hija! ¡Guía mi mano para que semejante herejía deje de profanar el suelo que hollan tus sirvientes!».
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Dios Emperador, escucha la súplica de tu hija! ¡Guía mi mano para que semejante herejía deje de profanar el suelo que hollan tus sirvientes!».

languages.text: “神皇在上，聆听女儿的祈求！愿您指引我的行动，让我消灭这异端，让它不再玷污您的仆人所踏足的土地！”
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

traits.locale_text: “神皇在上，聆听女儿的祈求！愿您指引我的行动，让我消灭这异端，让它不再玷污您的仆人所踏足的土地！”

languages.text: « Empereur-Dieu, entendez la supplication de votre fille ! Guidez ma main afin que cette hérésie ne profane plus la terre foulée par vos serviteurs ! »
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

traits.locale_text: « Empereur-Dieu, entendez la supplication de votre fille ! Guidez ma main afin que cette hérésie ne profane plus la terre foulée par vos serviteurs ! »

languages.text: "Gottimperator, hört das Flehen Eurer Tochter! Möget Ihr meine Hand führen, auf dass diese Ketzerei nicht länger den Boden schändet, auf dem Eure Diener wandeln!"
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, hear your daughter's pleas! May you guide my hand such that this heresy no longer defiles the ground upon which your servants tread!"

traits.locale_text: "Gottimperator, hört das Flehen Eurer Tochter! Möget Ihr meine Hand führen, auf dass diese Ketzerei nicht länger den Boden schändet, auf dem Eure Diener wandeln!"
